data.name: RecibeAlarma
data.value: You received an alarm near where you are Is it real?

data.name: AdvertenciaCalificacion
data.value: This qualification cannot be changed later. It could affect your future credibility if the ratings consensus is contrary to your vote. Are you sure?

data.name: MsgTrasAlarmaEnviada
data.value: If you are safe please describe the alarm, if not, hide your phone and get out of danger.

data.name: notificacionurgente
data.value: An urgent notification will be issued to the nearest phones at:

data.name: DireccionEscape
data.value: Please indicate the suspect's escape direction.

data.name: DescripcionImplicado
data.value: Description of the person involved in the alert

data.name: ObjetivoSospect
data.value: SOSpect aims to allow the community to alert and receive alerts of dangers at a user's location, in order to avoid risks to them and their loved ones. The location of users is not shared or tracked, ensuring their privacy. Users can place hazard alerts to help others avoid falling victim to risky situations.

data.name: UbicacionImportante
data.value: It is important to know the user's location so that you can alert them if someone places a danger alert near their location. However, the user's location is private and only the points on the map where alerts are placed are shared.

data.name: GenteUnida
data.value: With SOSpect, the community can come together to reduce crime and avoid falling victim to risky situations, alerting others to stay safe too.

data.name: ExplicaZonaVigilancia
data.value: All alarms that are placed at the point you are going to select will be notified no matter who places them. That way, you can be aware of the dangers that are running at that point. This is ideal for being aware of hazards in places such as your children's schools or universities or areas where your relatives or loved ones work.

data.name: CrearZonaV
data.value: Create surveillance zone with this location

data.name: CrearNuevoRadio
data.value: Create my subscription for this new radio

data.name: ExplicacionVigencias
data.value: All subscriptions have a validity, please check the prices of subscriptions in the first option of the main menu

data.name: xPoderesParaSubs
data.value: Powers to add this radio to your current radio

data.name: LblExplicacionProtegidos
data.value: You can receive alerts from members of your social circle even if they are far away from you. Here you can manage this feature

data.value: I want to buy super powers to acquire subscriptions

data.name: ExplicacionRadio
data.value: The default radius for all users of the application is 100 meters around. You can expand that radius using the powers of the app. Then select the radius you want for yourself:

data.name: OptCompletarTramite
data.value: Complete procedure to add a protected

data.name: LblSeguroDeCancelar
data.value: Are you sure you want to cancel the subscription? No return of powers consumed will be made.

data.name: Alarm_7
data.value: Request visual accompaniment by exit to street

data.name: Alarm_9
data.value: Suspect fleeing to your location area

data.value: The subscription of the requested surveillance zone has been successfully carried out

data.name: LblErrorZonaVigil
data.value: Error subscribing the new requested zone, retry or report to support, contact available in option "menu">"About"

data.name: LblSeleccionaNuevoRadio
data.value: Select the new radius in meters

data.name: LblSeguroEliminarProtegido
data.value: Are you sure to remove your protégé? The powers used in this subscription will not be returned.

data.name: LblSuspenderProtectores
data.value: Are you sure to suspend notifications to your protectors for 6 hours? All your protectors will be suspended alarms and the end time of the subscription will not be extended for this reason. The protector will not be notified of this action.

data.name: LblSuspensionRealizada
data.value: The suspension of alarms to all your protectors for 6 hours was successful.

data.name: LabelSeguroEliminarProtector
data.value: Are you sure to remove your protector? The powers used in this subscription will not be returned and the protector will be notified of this action.

data.name: LabelProtectorEliminado
data.value: The selected protector has been deleted. The powers will not be returned to the protector. The protector will be notified of this action

data.name: LblDeclinacionAceptacion
data.value: Without accepting a contract you cannot continue!

data.name: LblParaIniciar
data.value: LET'S START IN SOSpect!! To update nearby alerts, tap the blue refresh button

data.name: LblAlarmaNoGrave
data.value: Use the yellow button to place low-hazard alerts and alert your community or protectors. You can choose the type of alert and mark it as a crime committed. This button launches the alert in your exact location, being useful when you need help. You can also select a point on the map to locate the alert without compromising your location.

data.name: LblCrimenCometido
data.value: The red button triggers a category: crime committed alarm. SOSpect does not require you to include a category due to the importance of time in these cases. The alarm is automatically placed at your exact location. You can also select a point on the map to place the alert and then change the category to crime committed.

data.name: LblDescripcionAlarmas
data.value: In the 'Describe' option in the bottom bar, you will find a list of alarms placed by you or others. If you created the alarm, you can add a description. If the alarm was created by someone else, you can rate its veracity and complement its description. Be careful! If you provide false information or incorrect ratings, your account may be suspended. Carefully review the terms and conditions to avoid this.

data.name: LblDescripcionMensajes
data.value: In the bell in the top right corner, you can read your messages, which include subscription notifications and recent alarms. This list is different from the descriptions option, where you can find recent alarms directly.

data.name: LblDescripcionMenu
data.value: In the gear in the upper left corner you will find the SOSpect configuration options. You can buy powers to purchase subscriptions and protect your family or expand your alarm reception radius. REMEMBER! At the start, we give you 80 powers so you can purchase two subscriptions from the start.

data.name: LblRecomendaciones
data.value: TOGETHER WE ARE INVINCIBLE! The basic functions of alerting and receiving alerts within a radius of 100 meters are free, and when you start we give you 2 subscriptions. Invite your community and family to use this free service to combat rising crime. You can save lives or be saved by receiving an alert in time. Alerts of lost people or pets have a range of 10 kilometers, and violent demonstrations have a range of 1 kilometer

data.name: LblPromocion
data.value: Finally, remember that you will earn a power of attorney for each truthful rating you provide in SOSpect, when the voting of the alarms closes after 90 minutes from their placement. Most people are honest and together we will protect each other and our families. WELCOME TO SOSPECT!

data.name: LblDescripcionMapa
data.value: At any time, you can select the "MAP" option on the left of the bottom bar, which is the starting point of SOSpect. From there, you can view nearby alarms. Your location will appear in the center of the map, and the circle represents the radius that could affect you. By default, this radius is 100 meters, but you can modify it in the settings menu.

data.name: LblRecomendacionImportante
data.value: It is important that you open SOSpect periodically, before leaving home or when you arrive at a place, to update your location. This way, we can let you know if there is any risk in your area. Please note that when the app is closed, we are unable to obtain your location due to restrictions imposed by device operating systems. Check in terms and conditions related to your location.

data.name: LblMarcasNegativas
data.value: My number of negative marks is

data.name: LblCuentaSuspendida
data.value: Account temporarily suspended due to negative marks from other users

data.name: LblExplicacionSinConexion

data.name: LblSinConexionDescripcion
data.value: Active internet is required to retrieve your SOSpect account status.

data.name: LblSinConexionQueHacer
data.value: Please activate your internet and restart SOSpect

data.name: LblRadioActual
data.value: My current radius to receive alarms is:

data.name: LblPoderesRequeridosZV
data.value: Powers required for the selected enlargement

data.name: DebesAbrirLaApp
data.value: SOSpect can not know the changes of location of the user when it is closed, this happens by the battery conservation policies of the operating systems of the cell phones, so it is important that the user frequently opens the application to check alarms in the area to which it has moved and receive nearby alarms in time.

data.name: InvitaMasPersonas
data.value: To improve the safety of the user it is important that those around him, family and neighbors, download the application that is free. If there are no nearby users, the user may not be alerted in time or their alerts may not be heard, maintaining the risk state as it was before downloading the application. It is important to invite more people to help each other!

data.value: An error occurred while rating the alarm with code 1

data.name: AnerroroccurredwhilequalifyingthealarmCode2

data.name: AlertaEnUbicacion
data.value: Want to create a SOSpect alert in this location?

data.value: Want to create a SOSpect alert at your current location?

data.name: SeguroCerrarSesion
data.value: Are you sure to log out?

data.name: LblSeguroRenovar
data.value: Are you sure about renewing this subscription?

data.name: LblReportesDescripcion
data.value: Reports give you the opportunity to understand how you have helped other users by avoiding adverse situations. In addition, they allow you to identify dangerous areas on the map of your city and observe the evolution of crime over time. Also, through pattern analysis, it is possible to generate early warnings before negative events occur. It is important to note that the basic report is free, while other reports may have a cost due to the computational consumption necessary for their generation.

data.name: LblReporteEnConstruccion
data.value: Soon!! This functionality is under construction!

data.name: LblDescripcionMapaDeCalor
data.value: In this report, you will have access to a heat map of your area, where you can select different months since SOSpect began its operation. This functionality will allow you to observe and understand the evolution of each area of the map that is of interest to you.

data.name: LblCostoReporte
data.value: Keep in mind that the use of this functionality carries a computational cost and requires powers although it will not be a high value. However, you can acquire it without any problem using the powers that we give you in your first use of the application.

data.name: LblReporteEvolucionAlarmas
data.value: Evolution of alarms placed in SOSpect

data.name: LblDescripcionEvolucionAlarmas
data.value: In this report, you will be able to know the trends of each type of alarm over time in your area. You will be able to observe and analyze dangerousness trends, as well as identify possible decreases in crime.

data.name: LblDescripcionReportesPredictivos
data.value: As the SOSpect community generates enough data, probability-based event predictions and analytical tools can be made. These reports will allow you to know when waves of alerts or increases in criminal activity are approaching, giving you the opportunity to take the necessary precautions to avoid any risk to you, your family and your community.

data.name: LblDescripcionAnalisisTextos
data.value: Thanks to the fact that users describe the alarms and update their evolution through the internal chat of SOSpect, this report will allow to visualize the typologies that most affect the community. This provides an opportunity to take action to improve the perception of safety in your area.

data.name: LblRangoReporte
data.value: This report covers the last 30 days

data.name: Porcentajedealarmasciertasfrenteafalsasenunradiodeunkilometroymedio

data.name: LblSeMarcaronComoLeidos

data.name: LabelNuevaVersion
data.value: There is a new version of SOSpect and it is required to continue

data.name: LblReporteBasicoDescripcion
data.value: SOSpect's basic reports provide you with valuable information about the impact your alarm reports have had on your community. In addition, they show you the number of powers gained by helping your community by accurately scoring alarms and honesty in those ratings. Through these reports, you can also evaluate the overall behavior of your area over the past month, including the number of users who participated in the process and the number of users who received negative marks due to incorrect engagements.

data.name: LblReporteBasicoDescripcionCorta
data.value: SOSpect's basic reports provide you with valuable information about... See more...

data.name: LblDescripcionRepTipoAlarma
data.value: This report gives you information about the most frequent alarms within a radius of one and a half kilometers from your current location.

data.name: LblDescripcionRepEfectAlarmas
data.value: This report provides you with information on the effectiveness relationship between real and false alarms within a radius of one and a half kilometers from your current location.

data.name: LblDescripcionRepMetricasBasicas
data.value: This report provides you with data on the number of users within a kilometer and a half radius of your current location, as well as the number of users in your current radius of app alarms. In addition, it includes several additional information of your interest.

data.name: OptVolumenAlarmas
data.value: Volume by type of nearby alarms

data.name: LblCredibilidadActual
data.value: The credibility of my alarms is:

data.name: LblDescManualUsuario
data.value: Meet SOSpect, a free app designed to protect you and your loved ones. We have created a concise and detailed online manual that will help you use it properly. With this manual, you can get the most out of SOSpect and take advantage of all its security features.

data.name: LblAccedeAlManual
data.value: You can access the manual at:

data.name: LblErrorHabilitandoUsoNotif

data.name: LblReportesProximos
data.value: Analytical and predictive reports with data science!

data.name: LblHolaBienvenido
data.value:
Hello! Welcome to SOSpect.
SOSpect is a free tool designed to protect you and your loved ones by providing timely alerts about nearby risks! You may not get many alarms at first, as there aren't many people near you yet who have installed SOSpect. We ask that you give us a try and do not uninstall the application. SOSpect can save your life at some point, as well as that of someone in your family or community.
In the "Basic Report" section of the "Reports" menu found in the settings, you can see in the "Basic Metrics" section the number of nearby users within your coverage area, where you will receive alarms. Help us increase that number, it's free and will allow you to live more safely!
We invite you to carefully read this short introductory manual, which will give you an idea of how SOSpect works. Please note that it will only be displayed once after the app is installed.
Thank you for using SOSpect and for contributing to everyone's safety!
Tap the screen to continue...
